data.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
data.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

relatedRecords.description: Boise Code Camp is Boise’s premier free-to-the-community software development technical event and the longest running Code Camp in the Northwest.

relatedRecords.name: Future Developer Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: An invite-only, Director-level network where the developer marketing leaders debate best practices, learn and design better developer strategies. The event brings together 60 Director/VP/GM-level thought leaders in developer marketing to share experiences.
